mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (uname, passwd, ins_date) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM tb_user WHERE uname = #{param1} AND is_alive = 1
SELECT id, ins_date, last_login, "level", uname, up_date FROM tb_user WHERE uname ILIKE #{param1} AND is_alive=1 ORDER BY "level", last_login DESC
SELECT id, ins_date, last_login, "level", uname, up_date FROM tb_user WHERE id = #{param1}
